spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant layout distortion. The large primary bedroom on the right has been merged into the living area, and a phantom wall has been added near the center. Door placements do not match the original floor plan, and the kitchen/utility area on the bottom right is structurally missing its defining boundary walls.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the roof is removed and there is no text/UI, the layout is heavily reinterpreted. The model hallucinates an open-plan transition where a wall should separate the bedroom, and the entrance vestibule geometry is mutated.

furniture_mapping.notes: The L-shaped sofa and round table are present, but scale is inconsistent. The twin beds in the upper-left room were replaced with a single bed and a desk/shelf. Kitchen fixtures (stove/sink) are missing or vaguely represented by blocks.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to the low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic. The isometric camera is correct, and the model sits on a dark neutral background with no photorealism or textures.

detected_errors.description: Major layout distortion; internal walls separating the right-side bedroom are missing.
Hallucinated central partition wall not present in the 2D template.
Missing specific kitchen fixtures (sink, stove detail) and twin bed configuration.
Door positions and swing orientations are inconsistent with the original blueprint.
